channel.title: Noclip help needed
channel.description: some1 send me code, so that when some1 wright sommand ::noclip it dissconects them, not bann! and says this too every1 (playername) is trying to cheat, he is very gay!

item.title: Noclip help needed
item.dc:creator: @m0d-kyle m0d-kyle
item.description:
@m0d-kyle wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”)) { // the best way i think , kyle
BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/noclips.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::noclip");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Look him up and pm him in the game”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat!");
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage("
}
}
disconnected = true;
}

i think it’s like that.
